iteminfo.passive:
Unique Passive - Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3 seconds.
Unique Passive - Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.

passive.passive:
Unique Passive - Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3 seconds.
Unique Passive - Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Passive - Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
Unique Passive - Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gains a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield (increases with level) and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. This effect has a 60 seconds cooldown.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Attribute: +15 Physical Penetration
Unique Passive - Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (8 seconds cooldown).

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Attribute: +15 Physical Penetration
Unique Passive - Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5 seconds (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

iteminfo.passive: Unique Active - Frozen: Becomes frozen, untarge, and immune to damage for 2 seconds (100 seconds cooldown). Cannot move or cast skills while frozen, but skills already cast won't be interrupted.

iteminfo.passive: Unique Passive - Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

passive.passive: Unique Passive - Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

iteminfo.passive: Unique Passive - Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up 80 times.

passive.passive: Unique Passive - Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up 80 times.

iteminfo.passive: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grants 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4 seconds, up to 6 stacks. Deals 10% extra True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks. (Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects.)

passive.passive: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grants 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4 seconds, up to 6 stacks. Deals 10% extra True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks. (Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects.)

Unique Passive - Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Attribute: +12% Healing Effect
Unique Passive - Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35%, or falls below 35% within 3 seconds, they will get a (100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3 seconds. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2 seconds. (This effect can only trigger once every 60 seconds on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.)

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Active - Retribution's damage against creeps and minions is increased to 150%. When cast on an enemy hero, deals them 100 True Damage and steals 58-100 Physical Attack and Magic Power (scales with level) from them for 4 seconds.
Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

passive.passive:

Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Active - Retribution's damage against creeps and minions is increased to 150%. When cast on an enemy hero, deals them 100 True Damage and steals 72-100 Movement Speed (scales with level) from them for 4 seconds.
Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

passive.passive:
Unique Active - Retribution's damage against creeps and minions is increased to 150%. When cast on an enemy hero, deals them 100 True Damage and steals 72-100 Movement Speed (scales with level) from them for 4 seconds.
Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Active - Retribution's damage against creeps and minions is increased to 150%. When cast on an enemy hero, deals them 100 True Damage and steals HP equal to 250 plus 20% of the caster's extra HP from them for 4 seconds.
Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

passive.passive:
Unique Active - Retribution's damage against creeps and minions is increased to 150%. When cast on an enemy hero, deals them 100 True Damage and steals HP equal to 250 plus 20% of the caster's extra HP from them for 4 seconds.
Retribution is upgraded when the total number of creep kills, hero kills, and assists reaches 5.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Active - Conceals nearby allied heroes (including self) and grants them 24%-60% extra Movement Speed (scale with Gold from Thriving) for 5 seconds or until they deal or take damage.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

passive.passive:
Unique Active - Conceals nearby allied heroes (including self) and grants them 24%-60% extra Movement Speed (scale with Gold from Thriving) for 5 seconds or until they deal or take damage.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Passive - Grants nearby allied heroes (including self) 12-30 extra Physical Attack and Magic Power (scales with Gold from Thriving) and 15% extra Attack Speed.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

passive.passive:
Unique Passive - Grants nearby allied heroes (including self) 12-30 extra Physical Attack and Magic Power (scales with Gold from Thriving) and 15% extra Attack Speed.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Passive - Every 10 seconds, the next healing or shield skill recovers an extra 240-600 HP (scales with Gold from Thriving) for the allied hero with the lowest HP (including self) within 5 units. Skills that only take effect on self cannot trigger this effect.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

passive.passive:
Unique Passive - Every 10 seconds, the next healing or shield skill recovers an extra 240-600 HP (scales with Gold from Thriving) for the allied hero with the lowest HP (including self) within 5 units. Skills that only take effect on self cannot trigger this effect.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

iteminfo.passive:
Unique Passive - After inflicting a control effect on an enemy hero, marks them for 3 seconsd. Allied heroes' attacks on marked targets deal additional damage equal to 7-18% of the target's Max HP (50% Physical Damage and 50% Magic Damage, scales with Gold from Thriving). Cooldown: 30 seconds.
For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.

passive.passive:

For the first 8 minutes, heroes with this Blessing will not gain EXP or Gold from Minions and Creeps when allied heroes are nearby. They need to accumulate 600 Gold from Thriving (up to 1500 Gold) to unlock this skill.
